Name: Beuser & Angus Special
Ingredients: 52.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
1⁄2barspoon Powdered sugar (white sugar ground in mortar and pestle)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
2.5 ml Orange blossom water / Orange flower water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice wheel or wedge.
SHAKE first 5 ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
FINE STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
FLOAT half of orange flower water.
Garnish with orange slice or wedge.
Review: A floral, aromatic and herbal Chartreuse flip.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2007 by Gonçalo de Sousa Monteiro at Victoria Bar in Berlin, Germany. Gonçalo was inspired to make this cocktail for two fellow 'Travelling Mixologists', Bastian Heuser and Angus Winchester.
